title: Mistri for plumbing and electrical work
description: I am a skilled mistri with 10 years of experience in plumbing and electrical work. I can fix any leak, pipe, faucet, switch, socket, fan, light, or heater. I can also install new fixtures and appliances. I work fast and efficiently, and I charge reasonable rates.

title: Mazdoor for loading and unloading
description: I am a hardworking mazdoor with 5 years of experience in loading and unloading goods. I can lift heavy items, pack and unpack boxes, move furniture, and arrange items in trucks or warehouses. I am punctual, reliable, and honest. I work with safety and care.

title: Rang Saaz for painting and whitewashing
description: I am a professional rang saaz with 8 years of experience in painting and whitewashing. I can paint any wall, ceiling, door, window, or furniture. I can also do whitewashing, distempering, polishing, and varnishing. I use high-quality materials and tools. I work neatly and cleanly.

title: Carpenter for woodwork and furniture repair
description: I am a talented carpenter with 7 years of experience in woodwork and furniture repair. I can make or fix any wooden item, such as tables, chairs, cabinets, shelves, doors, windows, or frames. I can also do carving, engraving, or inlaying. I use fine wood and craftsmanship. I work with precision and creativity.
